attributes.action: Make Northern irish, Scottish and English banknotes legal tender all over uk
attributes.additional_details:
Please make Northern Irish, Scottish and English banknotes legal tender all over the UK

The currency of the United kingdom is sterling so why is there such a big issue on this
No matter which of the 4 countries I live in the UK I should be able to freely travel anywhere in the Uk and spend My money.

This is a massive issue and it needs resolved we are one currency and one union so make it legal
